name: MINDHACKER
description:
Controls:

wasd - move

mouse - aim

left click - shoot

right click - puppet/release dead bodies 

m - mute

Made for GMTK 2021. In the end I only had ~15 hours to make this. 

There is not quite as much content as I planned, but I think the basic game mechanic is pretty fun.

I may update later if I have the time to add more content!

Hope you enjoy!

Code/art/music made by Jet Simon
